name: Foxy
text: Activate:Main You may trash this Character: if the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, draw 1 card.

effect.text: You may trash this Character: if the number of DON!! cards on your field is equal to or less than the number on your opponent's field, draw 1 card.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' in image, but rarity is SP as printed.
